description:
tweaked chrome strings to fix space

BUG=232544

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=195123

messages.text: Dan this is to fix the comment you made in https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/12494033/ that there's a bit of extra space around the parentheses.
I don't see the class `standalone-line-button` anywhere in the codebase -- where is this?

lgtm

https://codereview.chromium.org/14017006/diff/1/chrome/app/google_chrome_strings.grd
File chrome/app/google_chrome_strings.grd (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/14017006/diff/1/chrome/app/google_chrome_strings.grd#newcode371
chrome/app/google_chrome_strings.grd:371: (requires Chrome <ph name="BEGIN_BUTTON"><button id="gpu-mode-reset-restart-button" type="button" class="link-button standalone-line-button"></ph>restart<ph name="END_BUTTON"></button></ph>)
s/standalone-line-button/standalone-link-button/

D'oh, I see what you mean now. Sorry about that, type corrected. Thanks for the review!

On 2013/04/18 04:51:38, Dan Beam wrote:
> lgtm
> 
> https://codereview.chromium.org/14017006/diff/1/chrome/app/google_chrome_strings.grd
> File chrome/app/google_chrome_strings.grd (right):
> 
> https://codereview.chromium.org/14017006/diff/1/chrome/app/google_chrome_strings.grd#newcode371

> name="BEGIN_BUTTON"><button id="gpu-mode-reset-restart-button" type="button"
> class="link-button standalone-line-button"></ph>restart<ph
> name="END_BUTTON"></button></ph>)
> s/standalone-line-button/standalone-link-button/
